name: Fire Emblem Pro-Skater
description: Ever wonder what the characters from Fire Emblem do when they're not slaying foes or invading Smash Bros? Simple, they're shredding up the neighborhood! Choose from Marth, Roy, Dimitri, Lyn, Robin, or the Black Knight and go to town on their boards. Choose from three areas to excel in your tricks. Show the world there's more to Fire Emblem than swordplay!
